steps.name: user goes to register page
user selects the gender
user enters his first "Automation" and last "Tester" name
user enters the date of birth
user enters the email "testRegister2@gmail.com"
user enters the password "12345_Test"
user confirms the password "12345_Test"
user clicks register button
user register successfully

name: Register | user creates new account to the system

steps.name: user go to the password recovery page
user enters email "testRegister2@gmail.com" and clicks on the recover button
a message will be displayed that an email has been sent to the user
user go to the password recovery page
user enters email "unregistered@gmail.com" and clicks on the recover button
a message will be displayed that the email can't be found

elements.name: user login with valid email and password

steps.name: user go to the login page
user enters email "testRegister2@gmail.com" and password "12345_Test"
user clicks on the login button
user will login to his account

elements.name: user login with invalid email and password

steps.name: user go to the login page
user enters email "unregistered@gmail.com" and password "123"
user clicks on the login button
user won't login to his account

name: Login | user login to his account

elements.name: user change the currency to euro

steps.name: user selects the "Euro" currency

steps.name: user enters the product name "laptop" in the search input
user clicks on the search button

user enters the product name "nike" in the search input
user clicks on the search button
user gets the result of the search with name "nike"
